attributes.action: Make fruit available in vending machines in hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was sat in Bristol accident and emergency with my 4 year old daughter Emily-Rose, and being bored waiting she asked for something to eat. When she saw the drinks, sweets, and chocolate available, she said,I dont like these, I like fruit. It therefore occoured to me that with the promotion of healthy eating, ie;fruit and veg, that the Hospitals should also have the facility to include fruit and veg in there vending machines.
